page.title: PeopleSoft Posts Third-Quarter Profit
page.text: SAN FRANCISCO (Reuters) - PeopleSoft Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=PSFT.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">PSFT.O</A> on Thursday reported a quarterly net profit, after a year-earlier loss, as the company saw stronger sales of its business software than what it had forecast earlier despite its continued fight to block a takeover from rival Oracle Corp.
